code: import{useEffect}from"react";import WorkoutDetails from"../components/WorkoutDetails";import WorkoutForm from"../components/WorkoutForm";import{useWorkoutContext}from"../hooks/useWorkoutContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const{workouts,dispatch}=useWorkoutContext();useEffect(()=>{const fetchWorkouts=async()=>{const response=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/workouts"));const json=await response.json();if(response.ok){dispatch({type:"SET_WORKOUTS",payload:json});}};fetchWorkouts();},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"workouts",children:workouts&&workouts.map(workout=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkoutDetails,{workout:workout},workout._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkoutForm,{})]});}export default Home;
